Pre-Game Insights: Spain doesn't put Yamal in front of the media very often, either because he's busy doing his homework or because they're trying to, you know, give him some remaining semblance of normalcy while he turns into a global sensation.
Both teams clearly have it, you only need watch them for a few minutes to see it.

Germany romped home in the last 16 against Denmark, thrusting into top gear the moment the Danes had a goal ruled out for offside by the length of a toe. Spain went behind to Georgia, then turned on the jets to blast four of their own.
If you want to reach the final, you have to face the best. I'd rather play them now than in the final. Let's go for it.
